jfilesyslib.utils

Class MemoryStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • jfilesyslib.utils.MemoryStream

  • public class MemoryStream
extends java.lang.Object
    A file system which may be written to or read from at the same time.
    The memory consists of chunks.
    It is thread safe.
    Author:
    Marc Miltenberger

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MemoryStream.Chunk
      Represents a single chunk

      • seek

        public void seek(long offset)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Seeks to the specified offset. If the offset is larger than the content size, the content will NOT be streched.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • seek

        public void seek(long offset,
        boolean stretch)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Seeks to the specified offset. If the offset is larger than the content size, the content will be streched iff stretch is true.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset
        stretch - whether to stretch the content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • write

        public void write(byte[] input)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes input to the memory stream.
        Parameters:
        input - the input data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the memory stream.
        It has no effect.
